post.title: bnib iphone 3gs 16gb white rogers locked
post.content: *note: deal does not come with sim card, must open to take out at time of exchanged*. kept it sealed to prove its brand new and unused. like the title says i have a brand new sealed in box iphone 3gs 16gb white i got from a hardware upgrade for sale. price: $550 firm location/meet up: toronto. eaton centre, scarborough town centre, or mutually acceptable ttc station. *note: deal does not come with sim card, must open to take out at time of exchanged*. kept it sealed to prove its brand new and unused.
